attributes.action: Ensure all NHS staff the right to reject COVID vaccines while keeping their jobs
attributes.additional_details:
Government should not force NHS staff to take vaccines they have decided not to, just to ensure they can keep a job. 
These NHS workers are valued members of the service and should be trusted to make their own choices on such matters!
attributes.background: Protect and uphold the rights of NHS staff to work without being forced to take COVID vaccines and ensure the rights of these workers as individuals who are capable of making their own choices on vaccinations whilst observing all proven health and safety precautions in their duty

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
